ygData.subject: Re: prices for enchanting metal
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen people charge 5g and do good business. Personally, I can t bring myself to charge more than 3g. What I usually do is sell lots of 20 enchanted
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen people charge 5g and do good business. Personally, I can't bring
myself to charge more than 3g. What I usually do is sell lots of 20
enchanted silver bars for 15p.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: DeGirolami, Franck [SMTP:degirolami@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 12:45 PM
> To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
> Subject: [eqenchanters] prices for enchanting metal
>
> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> I've been enchanting silver for a bunch of fellow jewelers. I've charged
> from 1 to 2 gold a piece so far.
> What do you guys charge? What about for electrum?
> Skara
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
